rules.name: myRule_23
rules.label: Move Opp to Up to Date

value.stringValue: "BK Plan - Pull Statements for Clean Up" & [Opportunity].Sortable_Last_Month__c & " | " & [Opportunity].Name

formulas.name: formula_11_myRule_9_A5_7677124247
formulas.expression: "BK Plan - Pull Statements for Clean Up" & {!myVariable_current.Sortable_Last_Month__c} & " | " & {!myVariable_current.Name}

value.stringValue: "BK Plan - Clean up and to-do list | " & [Opportunity].Name

formulas.name: formula_15_myRule_9_A2_1342561472
formulas.expression: "BK Plan - Clean up and to-do list | " & {!myVariable_current.Name}

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName , "Review Client") )
AND( OR( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName , "Monthly Check") )
AND( OR( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName , "Confirm Plan Approval") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName} , "Confirm Plan Approval") )

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName , "Clean Ups") )
